attributes.action: we want a coalition government so that one cannot hike up taxes and produce laws that are done on the spur of the moment poorly thought out and that are there to purely there to torture us mere mortals it is clear that one government cannot be trusted alone
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: laws that are rushed through,knee jerk reactive scare- mongering i want to be safe again and take responsibility for my own safety i dont want the government to do it for me i want to get back to a free country not a police state with free unrestricted movement over the country without fear of being taxed.
